dict.acceptation: 政治的；政党的；对政治有兴趣的；争权夺利的；

sent.orig: Attribute of political class, political party, country, decided political light and darkness, progress and reactionary property.
sent.trans: 政治的阶级、政党、国家属性，决定了政治的光明与黑暗，进步与反动性质。

sent.orig: Political philosophy is the philosophical reflection that political philosophers are concerned about political life.
sent.trans: 政治哲学是政治哲人对政治生活的哲学反思。

sent.orig: Political economy applies economic principle to the analysis of political decision making.
sent.trans: 政治经济学是把经济学原理应用到公共选择的分析的学科。

sent.orig: Comparing to western political party system, our political party system has profound constitutional base.
sent.trans: 与西方政党制度相比较，我国的政党制度具有深厚的宪法基础。

sent.orig: The Peace of Versailles was a purely political peace, and the League a political organization.
sent.trans: 《凡尔赛和约》是纯粹政治意义上的和平，而联盟也只不过是一个政治组织。
